name: uuid
description: Perceval UUID.

name: origin
description: Original URL where the repository was retrieved from.

name: repository
description: Repository URL.

name: interval_months
description: Time frame of each analysis.

name: from_date
description: Starting date of the time frame.

name: to_date
description: End date of the time frame.

name: study_creation_date
description: Date when the study was executed.

name: author_uuid
description: Author UUID from SortingHat.

name: author_name
description: Author name.

name: author_bot
description: True if the given author is identified as a bot.

name: author_user_name
description: Username of the user.

name: author_org_name
description: Organization name.

name: author_domain
description: Domain associated to the author in SortingHat profile.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the item was enriched.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
description: Name of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__gelk_version
description: Version of the backend used to enrich information.

name: grimoire_creation_date
description: Commit date (when the original author made the commit).

name: is_git_survived
description: Field containing '1' that allows to sum fields when concatenating with other indexes.

name: prediction_09
description: Number of days until the next predicted activity (90% of probability).

name: prediction_07
description: Number of days until the next predicted activity (70% of probability).

name: prediction_05
description: Number of days until the next predicted activity (50% of probability)

name: next_activity_09
description: Date of the next predicted activity (90% of probability)

name: next_activity_07
description: Date of the next predicted activity (70% of probability)

name: next_activity_05
description: Date of the next predicted activity (50% of probability)
